Dialogue: Well that's alright darling.
You take care now!
Why of course they are!
I make it a point of professional integrity to butcher all my own meat myself so that the meat in each pie is guaranteed fresh. Would you like to try one dearie?
Why hello there dearie. Are you back for one of my Marvelous Meat Pies?
They'll make sure you grow nice and strong!
Sure, I'd love one.

Dialogue: No thanks.
There you go! A nice, piping hot meat pie. Enjoy dearie!
You're breaking an old woman's heart, darling.
What do you have in that old locked cellar ma'am?
That's where I keep my Rye Flour and Dried Meats.
I locked it to keep bears out but I seem to have lost the key!
If you find it for me, I could probably make some Very Special Meat Pies!
